protocol_name: Human Kidney / Tumour Tissue Disaggregation for Single Cell RNA Sequencing (10x Genomics platform)
protocol_name_html: Human Kidney / Tumour Tissue Disaggregation for Single Cell RNA Sequencing (10x Genomics platform)
status_info: We are still developing and optimizing this protocol

components.data: Take dissected tissue (renal cortex, medulla or tumour) and weigh tissue (typical biopsy size used 0.5 - 1 gram)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Take dissected tissue (renal cortex, medulla or tumour) and weigh tissue (typical biopsy size used 0.5 - 1 gram)

components.name: Section

components.data: Tissue Preparation
components.name: Section

components.data: Pour approximately 2-3 mLs of "Digest Mix" onto sampe in 10cm3 petridish
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Pour approximately 2-3 mLs of "Digest Mix" onto sampe in 10cm3 petridish

source_data.thread_title: Comment on step 2 of untitled protocol
source_data.protocol_name: Human Kidney / Tumour Tissue Disaggregation for Single Cell RNA Sequencing (10x Genomics platform)
source_data.protocol_name_html: Human Kidney / Tumour Tissue Disaggregation for Single Cell RNA Sequencing (10x Genomics platform)
source_data.annotation:
PREPARATION OF DIGEST MIX

 

Ingredients

(1) RPMI alone

(2) Liberase TM (Sigma Aldrich)

(3) DNAse (Sigma Aldrich)

 

For 50mLs of RPMI add:

--> 625 microlitres of Liberase (Stock solution 2.5mg/mL)

--> 250 microlitres of DNAse (Stock solution 0.05mg/mL)
source_data.thread_text:

components.data: Tissue Preparation
components.name: Section

components.data: Using a razor blade mince into small pieces approximately 2mm3 .
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Using a razor blade mince into small pieces approximately 2mm3 .

components.data: Tissue Preparation
components.name: Section

components.data: Transfer tissue into a gentleMACS C tube and add further 3-4 mLs of Digest mix.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Transfer tissue into a gentleMACS C tube and add further 3-4 mLs of Digest mix.

components.data: Tissue Preparation
components.name: Section

components.data: Place in shaking incubator at 37oC for 30 minutes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Place in shaking incubator at 37oC for 30 minutes.

components.data: Tissue Preparation
components.name: Section

components.data: Homogenise sample in GentleMACS tube using program "Spleen 4" and "Lung 2" on GentleMACS dissociator.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Homogenise sample in GentleMACS tube using program "Spleen 4" and "Lung 2" on GentleMACS dissociator.

components.data: Tissue Preparation
components.name: Section

components.data: Pass through a 100µm cell strainer with of a 2.5ml syringe plunger and wash through with cold running buffer.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Pass through a 100µm cell strainer with of a 2.5ml syringe plunger and wash through with cold running buffer.

source_data.protocol_name: Human Kidney / Tumour Tissue Disaggregation for Single Cell RNA Sequencing (10x Genomics platform)
source_data.protocol_name_html: Human Kidney / Tumour Tissue Disaggregation for Single Cell RNA Sequencing (10x Genomics platform)
source_data.annotation:
PREPARATION OF RUNNING BUFFER 

 

 

Ingredients (for 1 litre)

(1) 1L PBS

(2) 5ml BSA (from reagent diluent kit)

(2) 4ml 0.5M EDTA
source_data.thread_text:

components.data: Tissue Preparation
components.name: Section

components.data: Centrifuge in a bench top centrifuge at 2000 RPM for 10 minutes and CAREFULLY remove the supernatant.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge in a bench top centrifuge at 2000 RPM for 10 minutes and CAREFULLY remove the supernatant.

components.data: Tissue Preparation
components.name: Section

components.data: If sample is contaminated with red blood cells an additional red cell lysis step can be taken.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: If sample is contaminated with red blood cells an additional red cell lysis step can be taken.

components.data: Tissue Preparation
components.name: Section

components.data: To ensure optimal yield for 10X Genomics single cell platform, a live cell enrichment step is required - this was performed using Miltenyi 'Dead Cell Removal Kit' (Please see manufacturers instructions for further details).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: To ensure optimal yield for 10X Genomics single cell platform, a live cell enrichment step is required - this was performed using Miltenyi 'Dead Cell Removal Kit' (Please see manufacturers instructions for further details).

source_data.thread_title: Comment on step 10 of untitled protocol
source_data.protocol_name: Human Kidney / Tumour Tissue Disaggregation for Single Cell RNA Sequencing (10x Genomics platform)
source_data.protocol_name_html: Human Kidney / Tumour Tissue Disaggregation for Single Cell RNA Sequencing (10x Genomics platform)
source_data.annotation:
LIVE CELL ENRICHMENT (Miltenyi - Dead Cell Removal Kit)

 

Ingredients

(1)  Dead Cell removal Kit - Miltenyi (Order No. 130-090-101)

(2) MACS Column (LS or MS)

 

In brief for MACS colum LS

(1) Use LS column for 10^8 dead cells or 10^9 total cells.

(2) Remove supernatant completely following previous steps

(3) Resuspend pellet in 100 µL of 'Dead Cell Removal MicroBeads' per approximately 10^7 total cells.

(4) Incubate 15 minutes at room temperature (20–25 °C).

(5) Rinse column with 1x binding buffer as per manufacturers instructions.

(6) Apply cell suspension in 1-10mLs of binding buffer and collect the effluent as the NEGATIVE cell population (i.e the live cells).

(7) Wash cells with PBS for 5 minutes at 1500rpm.
source_data.thread_text:
LIVE CELL ENRICHMENT (Miltenyi - Dead Cell Removal Kit)

 

Ingredients

(1)  Dead Cell removal Kit - Miltenyi (Order No. 130-090-101)

(2) MACS Column (LS or MS)

 

In brief for MACS colum LS

(1) Use LS column for 10^8 dead cells or 10^9 total cells.

(2) Remove supernatant completely following previous steps

(3) Resuspend pellet in 100 µL of 'Dead Cell Removal MicroBeads' per approximately 10^7 total cells.

(4) Incubate 15 minutes at room temperature (20–25 °C).

(5) Rinse column with 1x binding buffer as per manufacturers instructions.

(6) Apply cell suspension in 1-10mLs of binding buffer and collect the effluent as the NEGATIVE cell population (i.e the live cells).

(7) Wash cells with PBS for 5 minutes at 1500rpm.
source_data.body:

(3) Resuspend pellet in 100 µL of 'Dead Cell Removal MicroBeads' per approximately 10^7 total cells.

(4) Incubate 15 minutes at room temperature (20–25 °C).

(5) Rinse column with 1x binding buffer as per manufacturers instructions.

(6) Apply cell suspension in 1-10mLs of binding buffer and collect the effluent as the NEGATIVE cell population (i.e the live cells).

(7) Wash cells with PBS for 5 minutes at 1500rpm.

components.data: Tissue Preparation
components.name: Section

components.data: Count the cells and resuspend the live cell supsension in appropriate volume of PBS for the 10X application.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Count the cells and resuspend the live cell supsension in appropriate volume of PBS for the 10X application.
